While credited as a Tom and Jerry cartoon, this is not the cat-and-mouse team but an earlier Mutt-and-Jeff rip-off featuring them going about to survive in today's turbulent world. In the end, Tom and Jerry, being younger and with less experience and knowledge of life, go through much struggle and have to watch more than once what their elders (Mutt and Jeff) say and cut their whims and free-spirit ways down to a great extend.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to more recent Disney fairy tales, thanks to computer graphics. The biggest mistake to my point of view is a pretty traditional one, with one character being killed and another living foreerver happily. No mixed feelings that make the audience found lost.
But Disney's Snow White deserves to be talked
